title: javascript TypeError: "add" is not a function
body:
i have a weird error.If i start my script i get the error TypeError: "add" is not a function.The part of the script that dont work is the poart with the counter

<script>

And her is the code from the liabary.

function myFunctionAdd() {
    var p = document.getElementById("p1");
    var Audio = document.getElementById('AudioClick');
    Audio.src = "../audio/CookieClicker/clickb1.mp3";
    p.innerHTML = add();
}
function add(){
    if (Variable == 1) {
        return counter += 2;
    } else {
        return counter += 1;
    }
}

PS: I would become really happy if a answer help me that the script work^^
